public interface ILabelProvider<N>

Provides a label for a rectangle.

Method Summary

Method Detail

getLabel

java.lang.String getLabel(ITreeModel<IRectangle<N>> model,
                          IRectangle<N> rectangle)
Returns a label for the given rectangle.

Parameters:
model - the model the rectangle belongs to, never null
rectangle - the rectangle for which to return a color, never null
Returns:
a label, may be null if no label is to be displayed
